summary: A Claire Redfield Save-Game, Level 12. \"The Silencer\"
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://img205.imageshack.us/img205/5638/bannerclaire.png[/img]
Claire Redfield is a 21 year old women.
She has a secret hide out, The Asteria.

She is on a mission to make Skyrim a better place.
she studied Speechcraft in Solitude to make a good impresion on people around Skyrim.
Some people know her as \"The Silencer\" she gets everthing done, with her body and speechcraft.
Her secret hideout, is full of armor she uses to do missions with.

P.S: She is level 12, but if you wanna start from level one (player.setlevel XX) She did only two main missions, Next mission is visit the Greybeards

Mods Required to play this save-game.

ApachiiSkyHair:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168

Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

envision Face:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7897
\"You also need\" envision Face Large Lips for CBBE: Plug-in (Install Envision first before you install large Lips)

Skyrim 40000 - Weapons Pack:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14727

Skyrim 40000 v3_2:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13506

The Asteria:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13641

Victorias High Heel walk Animation:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13272

Dark Wind armor for UNP:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13528
[color=red]P.S: This works great on the CBBE body, if the body is maxed out.[/color]

Flaming Red Hair:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=12307 (Unless you dont want the red hair)

Mod Credits:
StealthNerf
Apachii
Caliente
DD AKT
TheycallmeQ
Mattcm919
xp32


Character Credits:
Fowyn
www.twitch.tv/fowyntv
www.youtube.com/mrravenreborn
Twitter @fowynprime

Please ENDORSE ME! if you like it :)
author: Fowyn
